channel.title: How important is productivity to you?
channel.description:
With an app to build and the need to get production-ready in a bit under 6 weeks, it makes sense to try and do more with less.
As a bootstrapped, two-man unit, there's just no choice if we want to create a product we're proud of.
Here are some of the experiments we're running this year to try and improve our productivity. What are some of the productivity experiments you’re running?
https://www.gethighlights.co/blog/productivity-experiments/

item.title: How important is productivity to you?
item.dc:creator: AlanC
item.description:
Deffo gonna take a look, as it’s nearly 1pm here and I’ve done nothing

Read full topic
item.source: How important is productivity to you?

item.title: How important is productivity to you?
item.dc:creator: egarbugli
item.description:
With an app to build and the need to get production-ready in a bit under 6 weeks, it makes sense to try and do more with less.

As a bootstrapped, two-man unit, there’s just no choice if we want to create a product we’re proud of.

Here are some of the experiments we’re running this year to try and improve our productivity. What are some of the productivity experiments you’re running?

gethighlights.co

5 Productivity Experiments for You and & Your Business in 2018

As a bootstrapped, two-man unit, it makes sense to try and do more with less. Productivity is key for us at Highlights, that's why we thought we'd share five productivity experiments we're running this year.

Read full topic
item.source: How important is productivity to you?
